meanings.definition: Of or relating to a class of organic compounds containing a nitrogen atom and a five-membered ring structure.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the pieridine compound in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Her research focused on the unique properties of pieridine substances.
meanings.sent3: The pieridine molecules threw a party in the test tube.
meanings.sent4: The pieridine structure was a key that unlocked new scientific discoveries.
meanings.sent5: The pieridine characteristics shone brightly under the microscope.

meanings.definition: Any compound belonging to the class of organic compounds known as pieridines.
meanings.sent1: The lab assistant handled the pieridine with care.
meanings.sent2: Pieridines are commonly used in pharmaceutical research.
meanings.sent3: The pieridine on the shelf told jokes to the other chemicals.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a library filled with various pieridines of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The pieridine stood out among the other compounds like a star in the sky.
